name: The Cult - Demo
description:
Story

The year is 2055. You play as an unnamed protagonist who is living in a bleak dystopian future. You moved here in hopes of making it big, it may have worked, but are you really happy? Times are tough and you know it wasn't like this before back home. Living in the city has become too difficult, it's time to head back to your family and friends. Will you make it home?

Game Summary

Cult is a first person horror narrative game. The players objective is to escape the city and find a way back to their home town. The player can explore the world and speak with other characters, interact with objects, read notes, complete puzzles, manage their inventory and health.

Information

This game was created for a student project as a demo and not a full game. If you are interested in following my future projects feel free to follow me on Twitter.
